Text.Value: *The parasite reels in your skull. Something within the Steel Watcher tugs at your mind.*

EditorData.InternalNodeContext: Delete if you are talking to a companion.

Text.Value: Apologies, citizen. Your record is clean - please enjoy the city, and remain vigilant.
*A shadow swims across your vision, and a familiar voice tells you to be calm. You are loved.*
Your trial is complete, villain, and the sentence is imprisonment. Please comply.
Attack.
*Your blood runs quicker, feeding the gnawing absence at the centre of your mind.*
I am a law-abiding citizen, and am free to go.
*The presence deep in your mind is awake, unblinking. This is it. A single word pervades your consciousness: 'Soon'.*
Halt, citizen. Submit to inspection, in the name of Lord Enver Gortash.
*A shiver runs across your mind... You feel sated.*
Greetings, citizen. I trust you are enjoying the city.
*Something stirs deep within you, hungry and alert... it's taking something you'll never get back.*
Halt, villain, in the name of Lord Enver Gortash.
Greetings, citizen Fluffington. I trust you are enjoying the city.

EditorData.logicalname: NOT ENEMY, NOT MET - Player called themselves fluffington

Text.Value: I am a law-abiding citizen, and am free to go.
Proceed with your business, citizen.
Greetings, citizen. I trust you are having a safe and productive day.
Good day, citizen. Please notify the Steel Watch if you witness any undesirable activity.
As you were, citizen.
We serve Lord Gortash, and the city of Baldur's Gate.
Be vigilant, citizen.
Surrender.
*Your mind lurches, reeling suddenly as if... bitten.*
Attack.
*The parasite reels in your skull. Something within the Steel Watcher tugs at your mind.*
Enemy of the people - face the justice of Lord Enver Gortash.
Allow inspection.
*Something within the Steel Watcher reaches for your mind. Your parasite shivers, but cannot make a connection.*
*Your mind is full, bursting with ecstasy and terror. Finally, it is coming. You are becoming.*

Synopsis:
Dialog for Steel Watchers. All Steel Watchers in Wyrm's Crossing and Lower City will be using this dialog.
You are talking to the hivemind behind the iron figure. Convincing one SW that you aren't an enemy of the Absolute will make the rest of SW non-hostile as well.
